General.Name: Zhejiang Tieliu Clutch Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Tieliu Clutch Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automobile clutches in China. The company provides cover and disc assemblies, release and hydraulic bearings, flywheel tortional dampers, torque converters, self-adjusting clutches, brakes pads, clutch boosters, clutch master cylinders, and double action clutches. It offers its products for passenger cars and commercial vehicles under the ieliu, Delsah, and WESTLAKE brands. The company also exports its products to the Americas, Europe, Asia, Africa, the Middle East, and other countries. Zhejiang Tieliu Clutch Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
